name: Putty - The Movie
description:
$$$
made for NYU's Winter Break Jam

started on Jan 16 completed on Jan 20

I chose the 3rd prompt which was to "yes and" an existing game. The game I chose is Putty by ohsqueezy

The original game is a text based adventure so I thought why not turn it into a visual novel

there is 1 good ending and 3 bad endings, try and get the cash
$$$

credit where credit is due: 

music: these are all spongebob production music tracks 

models: from models-resource.com 

other sounds: from freesound.org and youtube
